ComicInfo.Summary:
Flight Risk: Lloyd McCay tries to set a new altitude record for freestyle jet-packing.
Hot: Hellboy meets a "hot" demon-woman at a Japanese hot spring resort.
Curse of the Haunted Doily: Spoof story about Kate Corrigan being haunted by the ghost of her mother.
Midnight Cowboy: A young Hellboy and his dog get in trouble with some alien toxic waste.
Doc Hollow's Grand Vibro-Destructo Machine, Episode 2:: Lobster Johnson finds out the location of the Crimson Hood's secret hideout.
ComicInfo.Teams: Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense
